moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3: this game comes from my first games, as still 1200...
moves.2... Bc5 3. Nxe5 Qh4 4. d4: after this, you know black is losing...
moves.4... Qxe4+ 5. Be3 Bd6 6. Nc3 Qf5 7. Bd3: some Queens will never stop, until it's too late... in fact, the fun was over after Nc3; now it's too late...
moves.12. Nxe3 Bxe5 13. dxe5 Nc6: Ne7, Nd5, Nxd5, Qxd5, could have saved a lot of upcoming damage...
d6 is met by Qg8; blacks' pieces are trapped...

gameName: Fierce Queen vs. too Fierce Queen...
